name: Traditional Three Bean Salad
author: ccormia
summary: This is my mother-in-law Roberta Cormia's recipe.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can yellow wax beans, drained
1 (16 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained
1 (4 ounce) jar chopped pimento peppers, drained
¼ teaspoon salt, or to taste
¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
directions: Mix green beans, yellow wax beans, kidney beans, onion, celery, green bell pepper, and pimento peppers in a bowl
Combine vinegar, oil, sugar, salt, and pepper in a saucepan; bring to a boil
Cook and stir until sugar is dissolved, about 5 minutes
Remove saucepan from burner and pour dressing over bean mixture; toss to coat
Refrigerate until flavors blend, 8 hours to overnight
